message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to let it go for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll offer it to you for $105. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'll offer it to you for $102. This is my best and final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at your best and final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $99.

I'm surprised you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I've already given you my best and final offer, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $101. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not sure if I can meet you at $101. I'm willing to meet you at $100.
